name: Portfolio
description:
• Developed this portfolio using AngularJs framework.
  • Used Angular modules like ngRoute and ngSanitize.
  • Utilized Angular $http service to fetch data from the JSON file.

name: Life Band Disaster Management Toll kit: Pre-research prototype
description:
• Developed Location Positioning device using Android, Arduino, GPS, XBee, Java, WAMP, PhpMyAdmin and Apache Tomcat.
  • Implemented spiral technique of Software Development Life Cycle.
  • Implemented ZigBee protocol to create Ad-Hoc network.
  • Developed Android application to fetch the location of Life Band device.
  • Composed documentation and professional presentation for given project.

name: Weather Based on ZipCode
description:
• Created cloud based application using weather API, providing weather information using Zip-Code.
  • Created cloud based application using weather API, providing weather information using Zip-Code.
  • Developed using Python, HTML, CSS, JS, Google App Engine.

name: Chat Application
description:
• Developed Chat application where user can communicate with each other in group and in private.
  • Fabricated using MongoDB, ExpressJs, NodeJs, Socket.io and JQuery.

name: Premier League prediction
description:
• Performed data gathering and dataset cleaning to develop a model to predict Premier league result.
  • Implemented KNN algorithm on Hadoop to predict the results and achieved accuracy of 81%.

name: Designed Compiler using JAVA
description:
• Designed a basic compiler using JAVA and JAVACC.
  • Learned selection sets, Tokenizing, Parsing by Java programming.
